meanings.sent1: The baboonery of the child at the zoo made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent2: The baboonery in the jungle fascinated the researchers.
meanings.sent3: The baboonery of the comedian's jokes was contagious.
meanings.sent4: Her messy room was a true baboonery.
meanings.sent5: The baboonery of the playground monkeys was entertaining to watch.

meanings.definition: The state or condition of being like a baboon.
meanings.sent1: His baboonery during the game surprised everyone.
meanings.sent2: The baboonery of his actions was hard to ignore.
meanings.sent3: The baboonery of the situation made her smile.
meanings.sent4: The chaos in the classroom was a true baboonery.
meanings.sent5: The baboonery of the traffic jam was frustrating for all drivers.
